data.text:
Once again, I made it to the same hotel and I was very glad to do it this time with my wife, it was a very nice experience and all was so nice and smooth, the reservation was as I requested and I got the room I requested.
Everything starting from the daily breakfast and the housekeeping was excellent.
data.title: Everything was as nice as it can be

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
It's wonderful to hear that you had such a positive experience returning to the hotel, especially this time with your wife. It sounds like everything went smoothly and according to your preferences, from the reservation process to getting the specific room you requested.

Having a pleasant stay from the start, with excellent service ranging from daily breakfast to housekeeping, truly enhances the overall experience. It's great to know that the hotel maintained its standards and provided such a delightful stay for you both.

Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to welcome you back again in the future for more memorable stays!
owner_response.author: Adolfo Gonzalez

data.text:
Great hotel. The best is the reception Staff. Check in was fast. The man was absolutely handsome with us. I do not remember his name. Anyway all of them were great. My room was a triple one. It has not windows, but our stay were just 1 night, and it really wasn't a big inconveniencies.
We will come back
data.title: Front Desk Staff is the best

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our front desk staff to be exceptional. We strive to provide efficient service and a pleasant experience for all our guests. Your kind words will be passed along to our team. We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the lack of windows in your room, but we're glad it didn't detract from your overall enjoyment. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit! If there's anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please don't hesitate to let us know.
owner_response.author: Adolfo Gonzalez

data.text:
Beautiful decor, comfortable, clean and has very professional, friendly staff. The breakfast was of a very high quality and had variety catering for most tastes. 
I was a bit surprised the bar was closed and no reason given.
data.title: Over night stsy

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! We are delighted to know that you enjoyed the beautiful decoration, comfort and cleanliness of our hotel. It's great to know that you found our staff professional and friendly. We appreciate your praise for the various high-quality breakfast options; We strive to satisfy a variety of tastes.

We apologize for any inconvenience related to the bar's unexpected closure. We understand the importance of transparency and will be sure to address this issue to provide better communication in the future. Your comments are valuable and we will use them to improve our services.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again, and if there is anything specific you would like us to improve or if you have any special requests for your next visit, please do not hesitate to let us know. Thank you for choosing our hotel and for sharing your positive impressions!
owner_response.author: Adolfo Gonzalez

data.text: Stayed in two rooms at this hotel: 2 double beds room, 2 double ends with balcony room. Both of these rooms had problems with the mattresses. My friend and I were drenched in sweat every night (room temperature was fine). We think this is due to the plastic lining in the fitted sheets not letting body heat escape. Everything else we wonderful and hotel staff were friendly. However, due to the mattress issue, our stay was very uncomfortable and we will not be returning.
data.title: Mattresses get extremely hot when sleeping

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay due to mattress issues. We understand the importance of a good night's sleep and are sorry that this aspect of your visit did not meet your expectations.

His feedback regarding the plastic coating on fitted sheets is valuable and we will address this concern immediately to ensure a more comfortable experience for our guests in the future. We appreciate your kind words about the friendliness of our staff and your positive impressions about other aspects of the hotel.

We regret that we were not able to provide you with the level of comfort you were looking for during your stay. If you would be willing to give us another chance in the future, we would love the opportunity to make it right for you. Please feel free to contact our customer service department to discuss your experience further.

Thank you for letting us know about this and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again with an improved experience.
owner_response.author: Adolfo Gonzalez

data.text: To my mind a hotel room with a window that doesn't close doesn't meet the basic requirements of a hotel room and shouldn't be charged for. If it was a known issue, I shoukd have been informed and offered an alternative room
data.title: Maintenance issue

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with the issue of the window not closing properly. His comments are important to us and we regret not having met his expectations.

We fully understand the importance of a functional and safe room environment, and we apologize for any oversight in not informing you of the problem or offering you an alternative room. Please be assured that we take this matter seriously and will address it promptly to avoid similar occurrences in the future.

We appreciate your understanding and communicating this to us. If you have any further concerns or if there is anything else we can do to make amends for your experience, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team. We value your comments and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again for a much better stay.
owner_response.author: Adolfo Gonzalez
